publicationStmt.publisher: The Characters that shaped the Silk Road - A Database and Digital Paleography of Tarim

history.provenance: found in SiŋgimSängimer Schluchtduring T II S 33

seg.seg: Nur einmal gelang es ihr [scil. Yaśodharā], mich mit süßen Genüssen zu betören.
Only once, she [i.e. Yaśodharā] was able to seduce me with sweet pleasures.
Das Diadem setzte sie [scil. Yaśodharā] sich aufs Haupt
She [i.e. Yaśodharā] set the diadem upon her [own] head.
... hüpfte in ihrem Herzen, [und] sie stürzte sich vom Söller herab.
... leapt in her heart, [and] she cast herself from the balcony.
Schon in früherer Zeit hat sie aus Neigung zu mir [ihr] Leben hingegeben.
In earlier times already she gave [her] life out of affection for me.
Mit ganzer Kraft spannte er voll den Bogen [und] schoss.
With all [his] strength he drew the bow [and] shot.

p.note: Cf. also - [[THT 1576.h]]. Lines a1 and b10 are missing.

list.item: a2 /// ṣṣ(i) weña /// a3 /// mtts· skāya_s\ • santsā_r_aṣṣana (eṅka)lwa treṅkalwa teṃ ya – – a4 /// ktsanma ekañenta ārwer yāmormeṃ ysāṣṣeṃ ñikañceṃ wmera wrākaññeṃ [no] a5 /// [lo]pāte • prā_p\ mahu_r\ āssa _t_assāte • haranma muktihā_r_anta wrākañe a6 /// ·pu_r_aṣṣana klainampa rāhuleṃ palkasi yalñeṣṣai [ṣ]ewisa kapila a7 /// añjā_l\ ṣarne yāmusa cāk_kä_r\ lakṣāntsa yaituwa klyomñāna lalaṃṣka a8 /// na ekañenta pañikte _k_aṣṣintse ṣesa sāṅ_k_ampa carit yamaṣṣa – – a9 /// [t]e keklyauṣormeṃ po eṅkalwa yaika srotāpattiññe perne kalpa || a10 /// weña ṣe ka yatāte ñi_ś\ yāṅ_k_assi • śukentasa swaro b1 /// [n]y(a)[g]r[o]dhārām saṅkrāmi_ś\ yatsi omtsate yaśodharai lantso – b2 /// [s·] araṃśne salāte-ne • k_ucatākmeṃ ṣañe_m\ ette ṣallāte • cau[k] camelne b3 /// _k_aṣṣintse akṣāre saim wästa yaśodhara lāntsa śikamaiyyaine laraum(·)e – b4 /// rintsate ñi pelykiṃ • nauṣ ra preśyaine ñśa[ṣṣ]e treṅ_k_altsa śau_l\ rintsate tu pklyauss[o] b5 /// re prākre _k_l_antsaññi • yaśaswiñi kinnarña puwā _ś\ āksausa _l_amau b6 /// po war_k_ṣ_altsa wäntalyi ite [_p_a]nnāte karṣṣa • sādhukeṃ kinnareṃ arañcä\ b7 /// lyaku_r\ akartte klyommon_t\ palsko sā_k_aske tu ttu tārkañä\ ko_s\ ṣa b8 /// [o]ta_k _ṣ\ pālkau-ne ce kca tu lekanma pikā_r_anta ya – – b9 /// [me]_r\ masa ///

a2 /// ṣṣ(i) weña /// a3 /// mtts· skāyas • santsāräṣṣana (eṅka)lwa treṅkalwa teṃ ya – – a4 /// ktsanma ekañenta ārwer yāmormeṃ ysāṣṣeṃ ñkañceṃ|ñikañceṃ wmera wrākaññeṃ no a5 /// lopāte • prāp mahur āssa tässāte • haranma muktihāränta wrākañe a6 /// ·puräṣṣana klainampa rāhuleṃ palkasi yalñeṣṣai ṣewisa kapila a7 /// añjāl ṣarne yāmusa cākkär lakṣāntsa yaituwa klyomñāna lalaṃṣka a8 /// na ekañenta pañikte käṣṣintse ṣesa sāṅkämpa carit yamaṣṣa – – a9 /// te keklyauṣormeṃ po eṅkalwa yaika srotāpattiññe perne kalpa || a10 /// weña ṣe ka yatāte ñiś yāṅkässi • śukentasa swaro b1 /// ny(a)grodhārām saṅkrāmiś yatsi omtsate yaśodharai lantso – b2 /// s· araṃśne salāte-ne • k_ucatākmeṃ ṣañem ette ṣallāte • cauk camelne b3 /// käṣṣintse akṣāre saim wästa yaśodhara lāntsa śikamaiyyaine laraum(·)e – b4 /// rintsate ñi pelykiṃ • nauṣ ra preśyaine ñśaṣṣe treṅkältsa śaul rintsate tu pklyausso b5 /// re prākre kläntsaññi • yaśaswiñi kinnarña puwā ś āksausa lämau b6 /// po warkṣältsa wäntalyi ite pännāte karṣṣa • sādhukeṃ kinnareṃ arañc b7 /// lyakur akartte klyommont palsko sākäske tu ttu tārkañ kos ṣa b8 /// otak ṣ pālkau-ne ce kca tu lekanma pikāränta ya – – b9 /// mer masa ///

Translations from [[Schmidt KT 1974]]
Lines Translation Pages
a5 Das Diadem setzte sie [scil. Yaśodharā] sich aufs Haupt 80, 354
a10 Nur einmal gelang es ihr [scil. Yaśodharā], mich mit süßen Genüssen zu betören. 40
b2 ... hüpfte in ihrem Herzen, [und] sie stürzte sich vom Söller herab. 279, 311, 316, fn. 4
b4 Schon in früherer Zeit hat sie aus Neigung zu mir [ihr] Leben hingegeben. 418
b6 Mit ganzer Kraft spannte er voll den Bogen [und] schoss. 354
Cf. also [[THT 1575.a]] - [[THT 1576.h]]. Lines a1 and b10 are missing.
